entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Alliston
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
